question: When was Adam Smith's work "An Enquiry into the Nature and Causes of Wealth of Nations" published?
explanation: Adam Smith in 1776 published the book \"An Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations\". He used the phrase \"The invisible hand\" in his book. It refers to the market forces that lead to the eventual benefit of overall society when individuals are pursuing their goals for their own good alone.
